App Description for Rocketman

Brief: Rocketman is your go-to transit companion, designed to elevate the public commuting experience. It provides real-time updates, arrival times, and service alerts for a hassle-free journey. Whether you're a daily commuter or a visitor in supported regions, Rocketman is the smart choice for timely and informed travel on bus, streetcar, and train services.

  • ğŸ”” Customizable reminders and alerts that prevent you from ever missing your stop or transport.
  • ğŸ“ˆ Crowding reports particularly for the TTC users, providing insights into current seat availability.
